Collect the picnic basket
'I figured that much. Perhaps I should go on a journey one day!'
An adequate picnic spot can be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should set down the picnic supplies.
An adequate picnic spot can be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should set down the picnic supplies.

'Hullo, my name is Valaric Túcca and it's nice to meet you. I have a question, well, maybe two questions! Actually, I have many questions about life outside of Lyndelby. Um, first, how would you like to go on a picnic? Come on! We'll find a perfectly delightful spot! Well, it doesn't really need to be delightful or perfect. Any ol' adequate picnic spot will do. Oh! I know a good place. Grab the blanket and basket and meet me there.'
Talk to Valaric Túcca on the picnic
Place the picnic blanket
Unpack the picnic basket
This is an adequate spot for a picnic
Valaric Túcca can be found at the picnic spot in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should answer Valaric Túcca's question.
There are many occupants of the hidden village of Lyndelby who are curious to meet with you.

'Thanks for coming on this picnic with me, [placeholder]. It sure is nice to talk to someone new for once. Sorry for dragging you all the way out here, but if I'd started asking these questions while we were still in town, there'd be no end of gossip about me leaving. I don't want to leave Lyndelby! I am just very curious, is all.\n\n'Anyhow, here's my first question....'
'Nice to meet you. I have a question, well, maybe two questions!'
'Thanks for coming on this picnic with me.'
Gather up the picnic blanket
'How very interesting, I dare say!'
'My, I never imagined so much was out there!'
'I love mountains! It is good to know there are more out there!'
'Thank you for giving me so many things to think and dream about!'
Talk to Valaric Túcca at the picnic spot
Talk to Valaric Túcca at the picnic spot
Talk to Valaric Túcca at the picnic
'I could never travel very far from home either!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Yes</rgb>, you agree

'Well that makes my life a lot more simple.'
'I am not sure how the mountains could be any bigger than the ones around Lyndelby!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Yes</rgb>, you agree

Find an adequate place for a picnic
Gather up the picnic blanket
'You must have seen all sorts of places!'
Valaric Túcca can be found at the picnic spot in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should talk to Valaric Túcca.
'You've shared with me such fascinating of stories about life outside of Lyndelby. Thank you, [placeholder], for giving me so many things to think and dream about!'
Valaric Túcca can be found at the picnic spot in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should talk to Valaric Túcca.

'Oh, [placeholder]! I'm glad I finally get to talk to you! I was worried that you were going to be busy helping everyone else during your visit!

'I don't need anything in particular, but I have a question, well, maybe two questions! Actually, I have many questions about life outside of Lyndelby!

'Um, first, how would you like to go on a picnic? Come on! We'll find a perfectly delightful spot! Well, it doesn't really need to be delightful or perfect. Any ol' adequate picnic spot will do.

'Oh! I know a good place. You know it, too, don't you? Grab the blanket and basket and meet me there!'
Valaric Túcca can be found at the picnic spot in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should answer Valaric Túcca's question.
'Have you travelled much of the world?'

'Thanks for coming on this picnic with me, [placeholder]. It sure is nice to talk to someone who's seen a bit more of the world—and one of us, no less! I'm sorry for dragging you all the way out here, but if I'd started asking these questions while we were still in town, there'd be no end of gossip about me leaving. I don't want to leave Lyndelby! Not yet, anyway! I am just very curious, is all.\n\n'Anyhow, here's my first question....'
'Is there much to see outside of Lyndelby?'

'You've shared with me such fascinating of stories about life outside of Lyndelby. I'm sure there's so much that you haven't told me, and so much that I didn't even think to ask. It'll come to me the second you leave Lyndelby—I just know it!\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder], for coming back to visit and for giving me so many things to think and dream about!'
'Are there any big mountains out there?'
Valaric Túcca can be found at the picnic spot in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should talk to Valaric Túcca.
'How very interesting, I dare say!\n\n'Now then, I have another question for you....'
Valaric Túcca can be found at the picnic spot in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should answer Valaric Túcca's question.
Valaric Túcca can be found at the picnic spot in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should talk to Valaric Túcca.
'Another great story of the lands beyond. My, I never imagined so much was out there!\n\n'I do have one last question for you, if you do not mind....'
Greeting Valaric Túcca
The picnic basket and blanket can both be found in Lyndelby.\n\nYou should gather up the picnic items so that you can go on a picnic with Valaric Túcca.
